sentences.sContent: This nonthreatening initial contact with the patient allows the physician to determine whether the patient has a regular or irregular rhythm.
sentences.sContent_eng: This nonthreatening initial contact with the patient allows the physician to determine whether the patient has a regular or irregular rhythm.
sentences.sCn: 这个对病人无威胁性的最初接触让医生确定了脉搏是否具有节律性。

remMethod.val: non(不) + threatening(威胁的) → 不构成威胁的
